titles.title: A bill for the relief of Inna Hecker Grade.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice.

bill.summary: 2/25/1988--Introduced. Grants to the widow of a named author copyright in specified works.
